name: miner-dashboard
description: Node.js based app to show the current status of your miner in a browser.
full_description:
#### Usage

```docker run -t -i --rm -p 3000:3000 -v /path/to/your/config.js:/app/config/config.js:ro  selaux/miner-dashboard```

Make sure you make the dashboard listen to port 3000 in your config or adapt the docker port forwarding to your liking.

In most docker installations you can reference the host by using the ip ```172.17.42.1```
